content: continue to work your decrease rounds switch to longer cable or dpn when needed round 2 knit in pattern continue these two rounds until there are 48 66 stitches remaining on your needle begin working only round 1 until you reach 12 stitches remaining on your needle bind off remaining stitches blocking is recommended to help with shaping of the hat _______________________________________________________________________________ here is the recipe for a four-sided decrease version of this same hat it will give a slightly different shaping to the top of the hat instructions for both small & med/large adult sizes with 2 5 folded brim cast on 104 120 stitches and work in 3 x 3 ribbing until you reach the larger end of the estimates from chart above this hat has less decrease rounds small is 20 rounds and large is 24 rounds decrease set-up round knit in pattern for 22 26 and pm *knit in pattern for 26 30 and pm *3 times and knit in pattern to end of round i recommend changing out bor marker with a removable marker before beginning decrease rounds switch to longer cable or dpn when needed decrease rounds work the decrease rounds 1 and 2 same as above except you will knit the sequence 4 times and decrease 8 stitches each round when you reach 32 48 stitches begin working only round 1 until you reach 16 stitches final round will be ssk k2tog 4 times bind off the 8 remaining stitches ©2023 galzanne knits all rights reserved for private use only
